generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Block Placement Direction
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Adds the "minecraft:cardinal_direction" and/or "minecraft:facing_direction" states and setter function to the block.

fields.title: Enabled States
fields.description: Which states to enable. Must specify at least one. Options: ["minecraft:cardinal_direction", "minecraft:facing_direction"].

fields.title: y Rotation Offset
fields.description: The y rotation offset to apply to the block. Must be [0.0, 90.0, 180.0, 270.0, 360.0]. Default is 0, meaning if the player is facing north, the "minecraft:cardinal_direction" and/or "minecraft:facing_direction" state will be north.
